dc_title_s: TPP 2040 Current Revenue Bridge Projects: Minnesota
dc_description_s: This data are the point features shown on map “Identified Projects in Highway Current Revenue Scenario” from the 2040 Transportation Policy Plan adopted Jan. 14, 2015.   This data come from MNDOT and was used to produce regional maps in the TPP. Data accuracy is not guaranteed.   This data was digitized using NCompass streets, regional highways, and aerial photos. It is to be used at a regional scale for planning purposes only and is not intended for site specific uses. Some alignments have been shifted for cartographic display purposes.   The data determinations were made on a subjective basis by managers at Metropolitan Transportation Services and Metro Transit.   Data reflect planned features and are subject to changes of the 2040 TPP.
